thread.title: Consumer stocks like Amazon could displace tech stocks as market leaders, says Josh Blechman

title: Consumer stocks like Amazon could displace tech stocks as market leaders, says Josh Blechman
text:
Consumer stocks like Amazon could displace tech stocks as market leaders, says Josh Blechman 7:58pm BST - 04:19
Tech stocks have led the markets for two years, but it's time for rotation into financials and consumer discretionary stocks, says Exponential ETFs' capital markets director in an interview with Reuters' Fred Katayama.
